sentences.cn: 一位富有敬业精神、待人体贴的教师

sentences.en: Beethoven at first dedicated his Heroes Symphony to Napoleon.
sentences.cn: 最初贝多芬把他的《英雄》交响曲献给了拿破仑.

sentences.en: Chiswick church is dedicated to St Nicholas, patron saint of sailors.
sentences.cn: 奇西克教堂为水手的守护神圣尼古拉而建。

sentences.en: He dedicated himself body and soul to the education of young men.
sentences.cn: 他全身心地投入到年轻人的教育中。

sentences.en: He is totally dedicated and brings out the best in his pupils.
sentences.cn: 他全身心地投入，最大限度地激发学生的潜能。

sentences.en: He was a consultant physician, a serious man dedicated to his calling.
sentences.cn: 他是个会诊医生，严肃认真，对自己的职业全身心投入。

sentences.en: He's quite dedicated to his students.
sentences.cn: 他一门心思都扑在学生身上。

sentences.en: He's too serious and dedicated, wrapped up in his career.
sentences.cn: 他太严肃、太专注，一心扑在事业上。

sentences.en: Her great-grandfather had clearly been a dedicated and stoical traveller.
sentences.cn: 她的曾祖父显然是一位非常投入而且坚忍不拔的旅行爱好者。

sentences.en: Her mother was a dedicated apostle of healthy eating.
sentences.cn: 她母亲是健康饮食矢志不渝的倡导者。

sentences.en: Mornings were dedicated to reading and afternoons to writing.
sentences.cn: 上午一心读书,下午专门写作.
她是一名坚定的社会主义者。

sentences.en: She is dedicated to her job.
Such areas should also be served by dedicated cycle routes.
sentences.cn: 这些区域也应该设专门的自行车道。

sentences.en: The church is dedicated to St Mary of Bec.
sentences.cn: 该教堂供奉的是贝克的圣玛丽。

sentences.en: This book is dedicated to the memory of my mother.
sentences.cn: 谨以此书献给我已故的母亲。

sentences.en: Virginia was still struggling to be a conscientious and dedicated mother.
sentences.cn: 弗吉尼娅还在尽力成为一位勤勤恳恳、全心奉献的母亲。

trans.tran_cn: 专注的，投入的，献身的，专用的
trans.tran_en: made for or used for only one particular purpose

trans.tran_cn: 奉献(dedicate的过去式和过去分词)
